annotation-spec.doc: This annotation specification was specifically developed to code face touch events with wearglass jins meme. This scheme is thus suited for people unconsciously touch his/her face, which could lead to a high risk of infection during the covid-19 pandemic. The most dangerous zones with mucosa are mouth,nose and eyes. Other facial skin like forehead, chin, cheek and ears will also be tracked.

attribute.name: type
attribute.doc: This track help to determine the start point. The value start of attribute status records where the tracking begins. To ensure the correct loggen start at the same time, the photographed person will press his/her nose hard and hold for a while for 3 times.

group.name: mouthzone
group.doc: This group clusters all hand touch events in the mouth zone. The members of this group give a detailed differentiations: lips, surroundings and all possible touches in mouth zone. Overlap is not possible. Look at description of touch values to see how that is coded.

group.name: eyezone
group.doc: This group clusters all hand touch events in the eye zone. The members of this group give a detailed differentiations: left eye, right eye, surroundings and all possible touches in eyezone. Overlap is not possible. Look at description of touch values to see how that is coded.

group.name: nosezone
group.doc: This group clusters all hand touch events in the nose zone. The members of this group give a detailed differentiations: nostril, surroundings and all possible touches in mouth zone. Overlap is not possible. Look at description of touch values to see how that is coded.

group.name: otherskin
group.doc: This group clusters all hand touch events in all other facial skin. The members of this group give a detailed differentiations: forehead, cheek, chin, ears and all possible touches on all other skin. Overlap is not possible. Look at description of touch values to see how that is coded.
